name: Crazy Driving (Neita)
description:
Welcome to Crazy Driving, your goal: try to get the best score. It's not going to be so simple, you have a horde of police on your heels! 

Some useful info:

 - Collecting coins allows you to buy boxes to unlock vehicles.

 - There are over 65 vehicles to collect.

 - Avoid traps on the ground. 

- Be the best.
